revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DI-707P |revision=B1 |is_manuf=No |manuf=AMIT |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |est_release_date=02/2003 |pcb_id=10340A6Y1 |type=router, print server |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=AMIT |cpu1_model=AMITSOC-0261 |fla1=256 KiB |fla1_brand=AMIC |fla1_model=A29002TL-70 |ram1=2 MiB |ram1_brand=GLT |ram1_model=GLT5160L16-7TC |expansion_if_types=Parallel Port (DB-25) |expansion_lpt_num=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=ADMtek |sw_model=ADM6999 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=7 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|7-Ports Broadband Router Plus Print Server}} :[http://www.dlink.ru/mn/products/5/129.html Product page] *1x 10/100Mbps WAN Ports *7x 10/100Mbps LAN Ports Note: Similar to the '''DI-704P''' model, with 3 more LAN ports. {{See also|SMC SMC7004AWBR v1|AMIT|D-Link}} *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/d-link-di-707p-7-port-broadband-router-with-a-built-89 ''D-Link DI-707P'' Spec. on '''SpeedGuide'''] ===Firmware=== *DI-604/704P/707P Firmware Release - Note Firmware: [http://www.dlinktw.com.tw/temp/dk2Support_Firmware/167/release_notes.pdf v3.11] :Hardware: Dx/Fx for DI-604 and Cx/Dx for DI-704P/DI-707P :Support DL7150/DL7300 CPU, Switch chip DL1005/IP175C :[[ADMtek]] ([[Infineon]]) ADM6999 - 8-ports FE (10/100) switch ===Models=== *[[D-Link DI-704P rev B]] (B1/B2/B3) • [http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/index.html Hardware] :CPU: [[AMIT]] AMITSOC-0261 (@143MHz) :Flash: 256KB Flash (''Hynix'' HY9F002TC-70) :RAM: 2MB DRAM (''GLT'' GLT5160L16-7TC) :LAN: 5-port switch (''Atan Technology'' AT8985P) :Printer port, no JTAG, unfinished serial *[[D-Link DI-704P rev C1]]/C2 (A1, B1, B2, B3) • [https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=30 WP] *[[D-Link DI-707P rev B1]] (B1/B2/B3) • [http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/index.html Hardware] :CPU: [[AMIT]] AMITSOC-0261 (@143MHz) :Flash: 256KB Flash (''AMIC'' A29002TL-70) :RAM: 2MB DRAM (''GLT'' GLT5160L16-7TC) :LAN: 7-port switch (''[[ADMtek]]/[[Infineon]]'' ADM6999) *[[D-Link DI-707P rev C1]]/C2 (A1, B1, B2, B3) • [https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=31 WP] ===See also=== :;[https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_models&manufacturer_id=3 D-Link Models] *[[D-Link DI-604]] (UP) *[[D-Link DI-604 rev D1]]/D2 • [http://www.szetszedtem.hu/342dlink-604/router.htm PCB images] *[[D-Link DI-604 rev F1]]/F4 *[[D-Link DI-704UP]] • [https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=161 WP] *[[D-Link DI-713P rev A1]] • *[[D-Link DI-714P+ rev B1]] • *[[D-Link DI-714P+]] • [https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=34 WP] *[[D-Link DI-724P+]] • [https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=162 WP] ==Images== ---- [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
